title: SHen doesn't have MR/LVL for a reason
body: that riven doesn't seem to have

replies.body: All tanks should have MR/lvl, should be common sense really. Not in Riot's world though... Apparently.

Back when Shen was initially designed, tanks had some pretty large advantages over mages due to the strength of defensive items. Some of the more damaging tanks could just roll over mages unless the mages were stupidly ahead. As a result, some tanks weren't given MR/level as a way to stop them from being too effective against mages. The game has changed since then. If/when they need buffs, adding it to them would probably be fine.

Its ok because Shen's shield scales off of stats he actually builds.... oh wait that's Riven.

But Shen has low energy costs right... no... no he doesn't.

That's at level 18, and because she gets ONE more health per level than he does. For most of the laning phase, Shen has higher base hp. 
Also, as a general rule, tankier champions that have a shield in their kit tend to have lower bases, since they have access to essentially free temporary health. Excellent effort though.

Comparing Riven to Shen is like comparing oranges to apples anyway, Shen is a terribly outdated Champion that was thought to be overpowered when split pushing was a new thing and Shen was considered to be the best one at it. The current meta on top lane demands you're in a lead in order to teleport gank and Shen's laning tools are so bad he can rarely ever ult without sacrificing a turret for it. Late game split push Shen barely even exists due to the fact that the other top laner will take TP as well (and follow him) while he has next to no real siege damage, wave clear or means of escape.

That and Shen was never good at split pushing, he just had a teleport to keep him from being out of position. When you have 0 AoE except a sunfire cape and no DPS to speak of, you definitionally suck at split pushing.

It's ok for mages to have ap scaling shields like lux when they build AP offensively right? perfectly fine,but not riven? Riven can't really afford to build defensively because then she loses damage, mages can still build glass cannon and have a AP scaling shields because THEY BUILDS WHAT THEY NEEDS. Riven will also reamain squishy because she will usually build AD only. If they change her shield to AP it wouldn't work, because all her abilities including her passive scale of AD. Also giving her mana wouldn't work because would she prioritize CDR or mana? and she would either always have too much mana or have way too little mana. And then she can actually have a reason to buy Tri force instead of "im supa fed"

I would agree with that except for one thing: Mages that build AP and have a shield worth anything sacrifice a damaging ability for that shield, where Riven makes no such trade off *because auto attacks scale with AD instead of AP,* so one non damaging ability that allows her to get a ton of right click damage is when things become not ok.

i would argue mages don't need mobility since they should be staying toward the back line anyways. Riven also needs the mobility/shield, if she wants to stay a frontline champion(if you lean toward her fighter style) because riven is not innately tanky.

i tend to lean toward her assasin playstyle, and look for good flanks, because imo, she's not that reliable of a front liner atm

Her shield is better than any sort of health sustain, except maybe Garen's passive after level 11. It allows her to juke skill shots *and* absorb a ludicrous amount of damage, where if a tank gets hit by that skill shot or damage, it takes them 20 seconds to regen it.

Her shield has a cd. A good 10 sec CD in the laning phase, considering most people only put in one point and don't get CD (unless they rush an early brutalizer, though Tiamat is generally the better option.). If a tank gets hit by a skill, they may take 20 seconds to recover. If Riven is hit when her shield is off, it'll take her about twice to THREE times as long to heal back the same health. That's right, 45 seconds to a full minute.

Zyra - Has hard and soft cc
